product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*

banner_details:
This banner is cleanly divided into four quadrants with soft, pastel background tones and a grid layout, creating an elegant visual appeal. The top-left section prominently displays a bold brand name (`brand_name`) and stylish subheading (`subheading`), followed by a refined product title (`heading`). A subtle touch of sophistication is added with a tagline (`tagline_1`) under the title. The top-right quadrant features the product itself (`product_image`), a pair of intricate earrings, centrally aligned. The bottom-left displays a bulleted product description (`description`), price (`price`), and a bold call-to-action button (`cta` over `cta_background`). The bottom-right includes a poetic tagline (`tagline_2`). Circular and grid motifs in the background add structure and softness simultaneously.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Pink (#FFF5F5)
- Blush Pink (#FFE4E1)
- Pastel Rose (#F9D5D3)
- Soft Coral (#F8C8C6)
- Salmon Pink (#FADCD9)
- Rosewood (#D65A50)
- Warm Gray (#333333)
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings featuring a soft and feminine color palette. Dominant rose gold (#F4A6A6) frames the structure, offering a warm base that blends seamlessly with pearly pink (#F7C8D4) petal-like accents. Clear, shimmering crystals (#FFFFFF with glitter effects) are interspersed throughout, enhancing the elegance and brightness of the piece. Marquise-cut gems with a hint of silver (#E1E1E1) add sparkle and depth. The harmonious blending of rose gold with crystal highlights creates a sophisticated yet romantic feel. This palette is ideal for an advertisement banner that wishes to convey luxury, femininity, and timeless beauty.
